text: It is indisputable that This Is Us left its mark the TV landscape this past season, emerging as broadcast TV ’ s big new breakout. The facts — and oodles of social media comments — also have shown that this high - octane family dramedy has deeply affected fans, to the point of tears. On Monday, NBC has released its first teaser in anticipation of season 2 — there ’ s no new footage, as production on the new episodes hasn ’ t begun — and in the emotionally charged spot, real - life fans gush about the impact that the Pearson clan has had on them.
